options.content:
Logstash host: {{host}}
Logstash name: {{name}}
Status: {{status}}
Version: {{version}}
Http Address: {{http_addresss}}
Current In rate: {{in_rate}}
Current Out rate: {{out_rate}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.query: elasticsearch.cluster.id: ${cluster_uid} AND event.dataset: logstash_metrics metricset.name: node_stats AND host.hostname: $ls_host
elasticsearch.cluster.id: ${cluster_uid} AND event.dataset: logstash_metrics AND metricset.name: pipelines AND host.hostname:$ls_host AND logstash.node.stats.pipeline.events.out_rate:>0
elasticsearch.cluster.id: ${cluster_uid} AND event.dataset: logstash_metrics AND metricset.name: node_stats AND host.hostname:$ls_host
event.dataset: logstash_logs AND logstash.log.type: Exception AND elasticsearch.cluster.id: $cluster_uid AND host.hostname: $ls_host
elasticsearch.cluster.id: ${cluster_uid} AND event.dataset: logstash_metrics AND metricset.name: node_stats AND host.hostname:$ls_host

agent.hostname: $ls_host AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/run* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/sys* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/dev* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/proc* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/var* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/boot

agent.hostname: $ls_host AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/run* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/sys* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/dev* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/proc* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/var* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/boot

agent.hostname: $ls_host AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/run* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/sys* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/dev* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/proc* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/var* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/boot

matcher.options: Average system.memory.actual.used.bytes != null && Average system.memory.used.bytes != null ? params.used - params.actual : null

settings.script: params.actual != null && params.used != null ? params.used - params.actual : null

targets.query: elasticsearch.cluster.id: ${cluster_uid:raw} AND event.dataset: logstash_metrics AND metricset.name: pipelines AND host.hostname: $ls_host AND logstash.node.stats.pipeline.events.out_rate:>0
event.dataset: logstash_logs  AND elasticsearch.cluster.id: $cluster_uid AND host.hostname: $ls_host
elasticsearch.cluster.id: ${cluster_uid} AND event.dataset: logstash_metrics AND metricset.name: pipelines AND host.hostname:$ls_host
event.dataset: logstash_logs AND logstash.log.type: Exception AND elasticsearch.cluster.id: $cluster_uid AND host.hostname: $ls_host
event.dataset: logstash_logs AND logstash.log.type: Exception AND ( host.hostname: $ls_host OR host.name: $ls_host ) AND elasticsearch.cluster.id: $cluster_uid
